page.description: Properties for the Audio Player control.

description.p: Defines the message to display while an audio file is loading. When loading completes, the message is removed.
Text dictionary tags (<a5:t>) and Language tags (<a5:r>) can be used to add support for multiple languages.
The message shown when there is no audio file loaded in the control. If there is no audio file loaded in the audio player, specify the label to show in the Audio player.
Text dictionary tags (<a5:t>) and Language tags (<a5:r>) can be used to add support for multiple languages.
